title: Wothlondia Rising 2: A Rose in Bloom
description: NOTE: THIS BOOK IS NOW INCLUDED IN THE WOTHLONDIA RISING ANTHOLOGY! https://www.smashwords.com/books/view... AND http://bookshow.me/B008AEFN8M A Rose in Bloom recounts the thrilling events of a young Rose Thorne, not yet a woman, who is trying to find her way in the city of Oakhaven. Orphaned and discarded, she finds refuge in a kind madam at a local brothel and eventually meets a man who is more than she bargains forâ€¦Wothlondia Rising is a series of short stories set in the original fantasy setting entitled the Realm of Ashenclaw. This series of short stories details life altering, significant events from the past that shape the course of these important heroes, setting them on the path that will alter their lives forever!
author: Gary F. Vanucci
